Text: Kaori Hamura (born March 9, 1970; Fukuoka, Japan) is an artist and illustrator, has many TV and film credits, including MTV's "Beavis and Butt-head", "MTV Downtown", "Daria" and "Celebrity Death Match", and TNN/Nickelodeon's "Gary the Rat".
